text: Serpocaulon latissimum is a species of fern in the family Polypodiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Navarrete, H. & Pitman, N. 2003. Polypodium latissimum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. title: Serpocaulon latissimum
